name: Final Delivery (BurnOut)
description:
Currently only available in windows

Anthony is a loyal pizza delivery guy merely trying to do the best at his job. Too bad everything is trying to kill him!

This is a game about life, death, moving on, and the drive to complete your goals even when the world seems completely against your every move.

In this game you can:

(things marked with * are not in the demo)

  • Deal with annoying pizza rivals!
  • Fight against crazed hipsters!
  • Play with a balanced and tested battle system!
  • Go to a huge hipster party!*
  • Watch the world crumble around you!*
  • Fight the one and only death?*

95% of the sprites made by me
100% of the music made by me
